name: Deploy fantastic Red Hat Openshift Container Platform Cluster on Amazon Web Services
description: This template will deploy Red Hat Openshift Container Platform in a high availability configuration

metadata.displayName: Red Hat Openshift Container Platform Cluster in AWS
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy Red Hat Openshift Container Platform in a high availability configuration on Amazon Web Services (AWS) EC2 instances

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux CoreOS 4.1 (control plane and compute nodes)
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 (bastion)

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description: Red Hat Openshift Container Platform Cluster

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description:
Control Plane - vCPU: 4, Memory (GiB): 16, Disk (GiB): 120
Compute Nodes - vCPU: 2, Memory (GiB): 8, Disk (GiB): 120

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Documentation for OpenShift Container Platform 4.2 - https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.2/welcome/index.html
3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
